title: Master of Wind
Ghost Lord
General of Hela
Morrow.description: Ex-disciple of Sensei Wu and candidate for the position of Green Ninja. After being rejected, he fell into darkness and wandered into the Ghost Realm in pursuit of power. There, he became a ghost himself and trained under a new master before unifying all the ghosts under him and trying to take his revenge on Sensei Wu and the ninja. After his defeat, Hela recruited him and made him one of her four generals, placing him in charge of spying and assassination matters.

title: Master of Wind
Ghost Lord
General of Hela
The Revenant
Master of the Sanjiegun
Morrow Incarnated.description: After the final conflict against Sigfried, Morrow, angry at his weakness and jealous of the power of the ninja, departed on a quest to grow stronger. He returned with an artifact as well as a new bodyâ€”half ghost, half human. His new body has all the advantages of a ghost without the weaknesses.

Annastasia.weapon: Dual ghost blades enhanced with wind power by Morrow.
Annastasia.description: Right arm of Morrow as well as his big sister, she is the most skilled assassin of the Ghost World.

Ghost Assassins.description: Ghost soldiers working under Annastasia's command.

title: Ultimate Weapon
The Hybrid
Rasputin.weapon: An anti-magic staff enhanced with ice and fire power.
Rasputin.description: A ghost soldier who was the test subject of Dr. Victor under Hela's orders. He was infused with ice and fire magic and given an anti-magic staff to create a warrior with no weaknesses.

Ghost Hound Master.description: A ghost soldier in charge of training and controlling ghost hounds.

Ghost Hounds.description: Ghost hounds can possess people and control them.

Ghost Captains.description: A ghost soldier who, after multiple battles, was granted the rank of captain.

Ghost Archers.description: A ghost soldier who attacks from long range.

title: Wielder of the Dark Saber
Successor of Mandalore the First
Din.weapon: The Dark Saber, a light blaster
Din.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. He won the Dark Saber in battle, making him the heir to the throne of Mandalore. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor and a jetpack made of Beskar.

title: The Sky
Alpha.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. He specializes in aerial combat and maneuvers. His fighting style complements that of his brother Omega. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor and a custom jetpack made of Beskar.

title: The Earth
Omega.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. He specializes in close combat on the ground. His fighting style complements that of his brother Alpha. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor and a jetpack made of Beskar.

Kamur.weapon: A laser crossbow, a light machine gun, a blaster with a bayonet
Kamur.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. He considers himself a weapons expert. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor made of Beskar.

Katan.description: She is a proud Mandalorian warrior. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, she is equipped with armor and a jetpack made of Beskar.

Ron.weapon: A light blaster and a combat knife
Ron.description: He is a proud Mandalorian warrior. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor and a jetpack made of Beskar.

Rhyx.weapon: A laser chainsword and an energy shield
Rhyx.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. He is a close-combat instructor. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor made of Beskar.

Verga.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. She is a shooting instructor. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, she is equipped with armor made of Beskar.

Jango.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. He worked as a bounty hunter for many years before returning to Mandalore. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor and a jetpack made of Beskar.

Boba.weapon: A long-range blaster, a light blaster, a rocket launcher, a flamethrower
Boba.description: A proud Mandalorian warrior. Following in the footsteps of his father Jango, he departed from Mandalore to become a bounty hunter. Just like other Mandalorian warriors, he is equipped with armor and a jetpack made of Beskar.

Grogu.description: A child found and adopted by Din during one of his missions. Din decided to take care of him and train him to become a Mandalorian warrior. For now, he is a trainee.
